title: SARIMA
description: Implementation of SARIMA method described in https://milets18.github.io/papers/milets18_paper_19.pdf.

parameters.name: train_window_size
parameters.description: Number of points from the beginning of the series to build model on.

parameters.name: prediction_window_size
parameters.description: Number of points to forecast in one go; smaller = slower, but more accurate.

parameters.name: max_lag
parameters.description: Refit SARIMA model after that number of points (only helpful if fixed_orders=None)

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Periodicity (number of periods in season), often it is 4 for quarterly data or 12 for monthly data. Default is no seasonal effect (==1). Must be >= 1.

parameters.name: max_iter
parameters.description: The maximum number of function evaluations. smaller = faster, but might not converge.

parameters.name: exhaustive_search
parameters.description: Performs full grid search to find optimal SARIMA-model without considering statistical tests on the data --> SLOW! but finds the optimal model.

parameters.name: n_jobs
parameters.description: The number of parallel jobs to run for grid search. If ``-1``, then the number of jobs is set to the number of CPU cores.
